storyInfo: After a complicated procedure concluded successfully, Kal'tsit finds herself having no choice but to take it easy for a day.

attributes.content: Subject's body temperature, oxygen saturation levels, breathing, and heart rate are all normal.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The operation was a success.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Good work, everyone.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: <p=2>September 28th, 1099, 11:38 A.M.</>, <p=1>Rhodes Island Medical Department</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: It's finally over... What a miracle, right?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: This might be strange for me to say, but to be honest, I never thought this operation was going to be successful at all...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Persistence on a subjective level and the inability to give up are perhaps one and the same. If we consider solely the outcome, perhaps we should take solace we persisted through this ordeal.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Chloe is a brave girl. She never gave up on life, and as doctors, we must never give up before the patient.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Considering how high the patient's cell-Originium assimilation levels are, I really can't imagine how it feels...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: This is all very strange, though. We've never seen such symptoms before in Oripathy, and her organs are still somewhat functional even though most of them have already completely crystallized.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: If we write a paper out of this, it will draw considerable attention in the medical science community. It could be a huge breakthrough to Oripathy medical theory.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: A breakthrough, or perhaps the disease has mutated in ways beyond our comprehension. It's hard to say which.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This is worth taking a closer look into. I will head to the laboratory later to analyze—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That's got to have broken the record for the longest procedure, hasn't it? That was, what, seventy-three hours? Seventy-five?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Seventy-nine hours and forty-five minutes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I changed shifts twice the last couple of days, but you never left the operating room even once. And now you want to go to the lab?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, you've been way too industrious ever since your trip to Victoria. Like, even more so than before.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Is there another reason to this?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: In a number of ways, yes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You were there in the meeting. You know the predicament that Rhodes Island is in right now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We only have so much time, Warfarin.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I could say the same for your stamina or sanity.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: No one can keep burning themselves out like this. Not even you.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I know my own condition better than anyone, and I will take the most reasonable course of action.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I can trust you on that first part, but if your 'reasonable course of action' involves working day in and day out without end, then I have to stop you.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Your experiment won't suddenly grow legs and run away. I can help you, too, but only if you actually live to see it to fruition.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I am a doctor, too. You can't tell me to watch my coworker keep on endangering her life. What you are doing is a bad example for the entire Medical Department.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: So, get out of Medical right now, head to the canteen for a bite to eat, and go back to your own room right now. There, you can do whatever you want.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I'm locking the lab's door. Until you get eight hours of rest, don't let me see your face here.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
Warfarin
attributes.content: Save it. No amount of begging will—

attributes.name: Warfarin
attributes.content: I beg your pardon?
I will follow your advice.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Thank you all for participating in this procedure. You have all earned some well-deserved rest. I, too, will stop my work for the time being.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Is there anything else?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: N—No...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: It kinda feels like... you've gotten more reasonable since your trip to Victoria...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: How about I give you a thorough medical check—
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Your time is just as valuable as mine. Let's not squander it on such meaningless pursuits.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I'll leave the postoperative observation to you. If anything comes up, contact me immediately.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Thank you for all your hard work, Warfarin.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Amiya, we're really in a pretty tight spot right now.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: I know... but we need a little more time for a solution...
attributes.name: Amiya
Logistics Operator
attributes.content: *sigh*... To think we're always short-staffed. I wonder if there's anyone—

attributes.name: Logistics Operator
attributes.content: Whoa, what the f—
Dr. Kal'tsit?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, you seem kind of tense.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I... I'm just a little surprised.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't think I've ever seen you in the canteen... so I thought maybe you...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Naturally, I need to eat for sustenance.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What about you, Amiya? Have you not had lunch yet?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Not yet... I'm helping the logistics operators to take inventory of our food supplies for the winter.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Do you want anything to eat? Today's menu is... carrot cake, carrot pie, and creamy golden carrot soup...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It sounds like there isn't much variety.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Well, about that...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: To tell the truth, we did run into a small issue...
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: We have more carrots than we can eat.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: After our last stop in Rim Billiton, the mine workers that we treated there insisted on giving us carrots to show their gratitude. Lots and lots of carrots...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes... Lots of them.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Amiya turns around and points at the mountain of carrots.
There isn't much room in the kitchen, and we don't have anywhere else to put the carrots.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We don't want any of it to go to waste, so... all we can do is to use them up as fast as we can.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Perhaps we can allocate another storage room for carrots.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Huh? Are there still empty storage rooms onboard?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There was a storage used for weapons and other war essentials. It's perfect for storing logistics' supplies now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Now that the war is behind us, we should spend our resources toward the betterment of our employees' lives.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If you need me to, I can ask Closure to have Engineering prioritize this matter.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In fact, we can take the carrots that can't be stored here to the storage room right now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We can't ask you to—
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: N—No, it's okay! Just leave it to me. I'll take care of everything.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The carrots indeed look very fresh.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This will be a particularly cold winter. Perhaps we should be thankful that we received such nutritious foods.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yeah... I still remember how Theresa was always worried about supplies every winter.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Back then, being able to buy food from nearby villages was very good news.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But there is nothing to worry about now. Rhodes Island has a lot more operators now, and we have a lot more ways to procure food. Things won't get so bad anymore.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're right. She put in tremendous effort to make sure all the operators had enough food to make it through each winter.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: However, important as that may be, do not forget to take care of yourself, Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Be sure to take your meals.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And don't forget that you can rely on those around you whenever you need us.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Uh... Yep!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, if you have time right now, why don't we have lunch together?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What would you like to eat? We don't have a lot of choices, but still...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Carrot cake.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya... Why didn't you tell her that your limitless supply of carrots is all we have left for the winter?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: We exhausted most of our basic supplies in Victoria, and we still haven't established a stable supply line after we got back to Rim Billiton.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit's been very busy... Let's not give her any more to worry about...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The weather forecast says the snowstorm will calm down a little in three days. We should be able to cross the valley and buy supplies at the cities to the north.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The barrenlands are dangerous. We should assign more field operators to the convoy. I'll chart the route...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't worry. We'll make it through the winter.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hm... If this won't do, then how 'bout this proposal? I guarantee—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Closure.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In the past forty minutes, you've shown me twenty modification proposals for Rhodes Island's nighttime corridor lighting system.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The significant majority of them are not remotely feasible.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Well, I'm working on the right plan. I just need a little inspiration.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We needn't have a meeting over this matter. This is something you alone can decide, and you are merely wasting my time right now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But you ended up sitting here in the Convalescent Garden for forty whole minutes! How could you call that a waste of time?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Did Warfarin ask you to come find me?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Bingo!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: That's not the point though. What's important is that you really need some rest. That's something that everybody with eyes can tell right away.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Have you ever paid this place a real visit ever since it was fixed?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I know each and every facility aboard Rhodes Island well.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No, no, no. What I'm saying is, as a normal Rhodes Island operator, you really oughta enjoy places like this where you can relax your mind.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Loosen up a bit, take a deep breath, and enjoy the feeling of being surrounded by all these living plants.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I bet you haven't noticed all these weeds and whatnot that Lena has been planting here or what they are called.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Star Valerians. First discovered by the Gallic scholar Jacques in 817. After the Battle of the Four Emperors, it was brought to Victoria.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It was widely cultivated for its aesthetic and medicinal value, and it is the primary ingredient in many hypnotics.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Gosh darn it. I forgot you had botanist listed on your resume.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Thank you, Closure.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But if you don't need me for anything important, I shall return to the Medical Department to write my report.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ehh, come on, can't you at least finish your tea first? Think of this as having afternoon tea with your buddy.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Just this cup of tea, then.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Tsk, always so stingy with your time...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: By the way, Kal'tsit, how long have we known each other?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Twelve years.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The year was 1086. After we excavated the Rhodes Island landship, Babel needed a sufficiently skilled engineer who can be trusted.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Theresa told me there was a self-taught genius engineer in Kazdel who was rumored to have laid one-fourth of Kazdel's nomadic cities' Originium electrical circuits all by herself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: When Babel reached out to you, you were linking the electricity of three districts to assemble an electric hot-air balloon.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Whoa, you remember even the year? Here I thought old people tend not to fuss about when things happened in the past.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I am not that forgetful yet.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But in these twelve years, you haven't had tea with me even once! Not once! And you call yourself a friend?!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: ...I don't remember.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hmph—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Has it really only been twelve years, though? It kinda feels like it's been a lot longer than that.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: A lot has happened in these twelve years.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Mind if I ask something? Just out of curiosity?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Do twelve years go by in the blink of an eye to you?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It is not easy to measure a sense of time with a metric. All we can do is speak in terms of relativity.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Twelve years is not a particularly long stretch of time. That said, everything that happened during these twelve years is irreplaceable to me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hmm... That's what you say, but I'm still really curious.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: If everything around you goes by in the blink of an eye, do you think of everybody around you as insignificant? Like the plants in this greenhouse?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: To the significant majority of races, Vampires likewise have an unbelievably long lifespan. Do you feel that way yourself?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Well, I'm still a pretty young gal myself... Maybe I'll feel differently once I'm, god forbid, as old as Warfarin.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I do not proclaim to be a gardener over all other lives that live upon Terra. Never have I, and never will I. This has nothing to do with how long I have lived.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even though you talk like a grumpy old gardener every time you're worried about something?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hm, maybe we should talk about something else...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Say, when you dug Rhodes Island out of the ground, did you think about what it was going to become?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I did.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That said, what it has become is nothing like what I imagined.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So your predictions of the future can be wrong, too?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Uh, no offense! Just blurted that out.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I've made many mistakes, Closure.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No one can completely take control of her own future. Not even a Cyclops's Originium Arts can see all of time's possibilities.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Time is like a river. On this drifting boat, we have no way to control the flow of the water or the wind, and we cannot see the reefs and water currents underneath us.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Most of the time, all we can do is hoist the sails. That alone is an exhausting enough ordeal.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Isn't that exactly the issue, though?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: If we go by your analogy, you just keep holding tight onto the sails for dear life, not even wanting to let go for a second. How could a person stay so tense for so long? If you work yourself so hard, those ropes are gonna snap.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I agree with your viewpoint.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rhodes Island will undoubtedly face many more challenges in the future. Both Amiya and the Doctor shoulder heavy responsibilities, and we need someone to share their burden in a different way.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Closure, this is something that only you can do.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: *sigh*... You're still worried about others. Too much on your mind, and you're bound to forget what's actually in front of you right this moment.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: For example, I bet you didn't notice what was in that cup of tea while you were rambling on and on.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What's... in this tea?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Don't worry. It's just a herbal tea that Lena formulated. Really calms your mind, especially so for someone who hasn't had any shut-eye for three days straight.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hmph... Finally got this old hag to get some rest.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Sleep well in the garden, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: I thought my medical checkup isn't for a couple days yet?

attributes.content: Indeed it is, but I personally need to fully grasp your condition.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The environment of the battlefield is particularly harsh to you. I believe your health condition requires close attention.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The tools I have on hand are more than enough for me to carry out this examination. No complaints, Doctor. This will save us both a lot of time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I heard Warfarin kicked you out of Medical?;She just wants you get the rest you need.

attributes.content: Owing to certain external factors, I've chosen to halt my work at the Medical Department today. However, that does not mean I will waste my time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Warfarin's concerns are entirely unnecessary. You should have a decent grasp of her personality already.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A lot of times, she is actually not as nonsensical as she appears on the surface. She works with the mindset of a responsible doctor, albeit an overly cautious one as a result.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: But the fact is you have the others worried.;A doctor needs to take care of herself, too.

attributes.content: You needn't worry about me. I have sufficient knowledge and techniques to handle my own problems. I will not allow myself to collapse when I am needed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I am not as weak as you think I am. To the contrary, your body requires more attention. I see that a few of your body indices are somewhat unstable.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Work-life balance, perhaps?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I've been working on some Originium-related research.;I want to take on some more of your burden.

attributes.content: Have you made progress? Or have you perhaps run into a bottleneck?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Perhaps I'll have a surprise for you soon.;Not being able to remember the knowledge I had before irritates me.

attributes.content: I am happy that you are willing to continue making such attempts.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A significant part of Rhodes Island's medical research results are built atop of your previous research. I myself am looking forward to you making further breakthroughs and bringing these lands a new turning point.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But more importantly, you are making this decision on your own will.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You need not be impatient. Although I am just as anxious to see the fruits of your labor bring a turning point to our predicament, but this is not something that can be rushed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Your past experiences have proven you can regain your past knowledge bit by bit through effort. What we need is patience and time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You are putting in the effort toward this endeavor, and the meaning behind it has far exceeded its outcome.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In any case, I hope that you can maintain a healthy and manageable condition.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rhodes Island will need you even more going forward.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I am doing my best to work out and get ripped.;So what's your medical advice for me?

attributes.content: Control your work-life balance. It will be beneficial to your immune system, although I know that is very difficult for you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Now do what you need. In addition to monitoring your body's condition, I will take full responsibility of your health and safety.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Does having a patient like me give you a headache?;I'm very fortunate to have a doctor like you.

attributes.content: That is not a very proper way to put it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, you are a special existence, and you shoulder a special mission.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I believe in your vision, and I will assist you in this undertaking as I always have. As a mere assistant to your vision.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There is no need to thank a person merely because she carries out her duty.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will never go against my promise, especially when I now have even more reasons to continue to defend everything.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: At the very least, you can trust me when it comes to your safety.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Why did you choose to become a doctor?

attributes.content: Oripathy is not the crux of all the lands' problems, but it is undoubtedly the most direct source of the hardships and sufferings that countless lives face.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It seems you don't need a special reason to choose to treat Oripathy.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Before you became a doctor, you had other responsibilities, didn't you?;Before you became Kal'tsit of Rhodes Island, you probably had another identity too.

attributes.content: This is not a pervading responsibility. Instead, it's one of the many methods that I've attempted to fulfill my one and only mission.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And I only realized later, but this is also one of the countless ways that I understand this world.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I learned to not scrutinize everything on these lands purely purposefully, and because of this, I realized that these lands need to be cured of far more than just violence.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: With respect to violence, a cure would be difficult and complicated, as such a method could only be predicated upon trust.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This is a method that I never once attempted in the past, and anxious though I was, I nonetheless had to stop thinking before attempting to find the answer.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And it was as if someone had told me... even if it ended up taking me a lot of time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Was it a very long amount of time?

attributes.content: It was probably much longer than who you are now could ever imagine.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The metric of time is relative. The two hundred years that I spent as a doctor seem particularly long because of everything that I lost.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Now, I see possibilities I have never before seen, and I have things that I never once possessed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: The current Rhodes Island?;The friends we have now?;The opportunity that we have?

attributes.content: Certainly, they all fit the criteria, but there is far more.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I persisted and made it to this point because of my original mission, and what I gained has far exceeded what I once could comprehend.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: That has to be an important mission.;That has to be a difficult mission.;That has to be a mission you can't ever give up on.

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I may not be able to thoroughly explain to you its meaning, but one thing that I am certain of is that it is the reason why the individual 'Kal'tsit' stands here now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As such, no matter the reason, giving up has never been an option.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I am grateful to the person who gave me that mission.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I am happy you're willing to tell me all that.
I never thought I'd get the chance to have a chat with you like this.;Is this part of the medical checkup too?

attributes.content: At the very least, it's predicated on trust.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I guess this will be a long day.

attributes.content: ...A long day.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
